page.title: 19 HEALTH
page.content: In Northampton we have several hospitals and an excellent system of health care. The new General Hospital ha only recently been opened and is an extension of the old General Hospital situated near Becket's Park not far from the town centre. The Manfield Hospital is an orthopaedic hospital. St.Edmunds Hospital on the Wellingborough Road was once the old Northampton Workhouse. It also served as a maternity unit but is now mainly for old people. There are also several private hospitals including St. Andrews St. Matthews and the new Three Shires Hospital built in the grounds of St. Andrews' Hospital. As Northampton is close to the M1 motorway the main General Hospital has become an important centre for accident and emergency treatment.
